Description:
Detects Obfuscated Powershell via Stdin in Scripts

Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Stdin - PowerShell Module
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where payload re '(?i)(set).*&&\s?set.*(environment|invoke|\$?\{?input).*&&.*"'
